raw_comment: I notice that women tend to reach out to their parents more then men. I wonder why women reach out more. This relates to our community because everyone of us has reached out to our parents and I have noticed personally that girls reach out more.
ace_sentences: I notice that women tend to reach out to their parents more than men.
I wonder why women reach out to their parents more than men.
Everyone of us has reached out to his or her parents.
I have noticed personally that girls reach out to their parents more than boys.
